subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees took their eyes off the prize by brawling with the Blue Jays, while, in Boston, the Red Sox were ecstatic with Daisuke Matsuzaka’s return to the rotation.
snippet: The Yankees took their eyes off the prize by brawling with the Blue Jays, while, in Boston, the Red Sox were ecstatic with Daisuke Matsuzaka’s return to the rotation.
